input.sentences: this past weekend | we all got together for a friend 's birthday .
this is her youngest child and is cute as a button .

output.sentences: This past weekend was well spent with friends.
This child was as cute as a button.
My friends daughter was so sophisticated.
We had fun celebrating my friends birthday.
It was a lovely friends and family dinner.
